servers.name: Local
servers.description: This assumes `%roller-rpc.hoon` running on a test ship

methods.name: getPoint
methods.summary: Retrieves Azimuth Point data for a specific ship

result.name: point
result.description: Expected response to be a valid request

examples.name: getPoint-example
examples.description:
Retrieve Azimuth Point information from the rollup for ~norsyr-torryn. 
Example: 
`curl -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc": "2.0","method": "getPoint","params": {"ship": "~norsyr-torryn"},"id": 1}' http://localhost:8080/v1-azimuth`

methods.name: getShips
methods.summary: Returns all the ships controlled by an ethereum address

methods.name: transferPoint
methods.summary: Transfers a point to an ethereum address

methods.name: spawn
methods.summary: Spawns a ship to an Ethereum Address

methods.name: configureKeys
methods.summary: Configure Keys

methods.name: escape
methods.summary: Request escaping to a different sponsor

methods.name: cancelEscape
methods.summary: Cancel request to escape

methods.name: adopt
methods.summary: Adopt ship

methods.name: detach
methods.summary: Detach ship

methods.name: reject
methods.summary: Reject ship

methods.name: setManagementProxy
methods.summary: Set Management Proxy

methods.name: setSpawnProxy
methods.summary: Set Spawn Proxy

methods.name: setTransferProxy
methods.summary: Set Transfer Proxy

methods.name: getAllPending
methods.summary: Gets all pending transactions in the roller

methods.name: getPendingByShip
methods.summary: Gets all pending transactions in the roller, by ship

methods.name: getPendingByAddress
methods.summary: Gets all pending transactions in the roller, by address

methods.name: getSpawned
methods.summary: Gets all spawned points by a star or galaxy

result.name: spawned points
result.description: List of spawned points and the ownership ethereum address

ship.title: ShipName
ship.description: Ship encoded as a patp without leading sig

methods.name: whenNextBatch
methods.summary: Timestamp of when the next L2 batch will be submitted

methods.name: getTransactionStatus
methods.summary: Status of an L2 transaction submitted to the Roller

methods.name: getHistory
methods.summary: Returns status, hash and type of all L2 tx submitted by an ethereum address,

methods.name: getNonce
methods.summary: Current nonce used by the Roller

methods.name: cancelTransaction
methods.summary: Cancels a transaction that hasn't been sent out

methods.name: getRollerConfig
methods.summary: Returns configuration parameters of the Roller

methods.name: getDns
methods.summary: Naive Rollup DNSs

methods.name: hashTransaction
methods.summary: Returns an unsigned L2 transaction, ready to be signed

From.title: From
From.description: Ship that sends the transaction and type of Ethereum address that controls it

TransactionStatus.title: TransactionStatus
TransactionStatus.description: One of: confirmed, pending, sending, confirmed, failed, unknown

TransactionType.title: TransactionType
TransactionType.description: One of transfer-point, spawn, configure-keys, escape, cancel-escape, adopt, reject, detach, set-management-proxy, set-spawn-proxy, set-transfer-proxy

L2Transaction.title: L2Transaction
L2Transaction.description: Raw L2 transaction as defined in /lib/naive.hoon

PendingTransaction.title: PendingTransaction
PendingTransaction.description: Pending transaction in the Roller, waiting to be submitted to Ethereum

L2Data.title: L2Data
L2Data.description: Data requiered for a L2 Transaction

NextBatch.title: NextBatch
NextBatch.description: Timestamp of when the next roll of L2 txs will be sent out

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: How often the Roller sends out a new batch

refreshTime.title: RefreshTime
refreshTime.description: How ofthen the Roller updates its state

Hash.title: Hash
Hash.description: Keccak-256 (not the standardized SHA3-256) of the given data.
